TEAM EUPHORiA releases a big add on for Flight Simulator X or Flight Simulator 2004. This add on brings a lot of new features to the game, and more detailed planes. Ive got FSX, however no decent knowledge of flying;)

Airliner enthusiasts can now take their places in a Flight Simulator X captains seat and command the worlds favourite airliner! The -300, -400 and -500 versions of the 737 have been expertly modelled and come with a choice of over 70 airline liveries. The beauty is more than skin deep ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ 737 Pilot In Command has advanced avionics and a highly accurate flight model. Other features include working weather radar and a printed manual that comes with a bespoke tutorial from the acclaimed trainer Captain Mike Ray. The new FSX version includes some extra features including innovative in-flight passenger screens and 737 Pilot In Command is also fully compatible with Windows Vista and the Flight Simulator SP2 service pack.
